Smart Luggage Tag with GPS Tracking and Bluetooth Connectivity: This luggage tag is equipped with a built-in GPS tracker that allows you to track the location of your luggage in real-time. It also features Bluetooth connectivity, allowing you to connect it to your smartphone and receive notifications when your luggage is near or far from you. This tag can also be used to set up geofences, so you can receive notifications when your luggage enters or exits a specific area.

Augmented Reality Luggage Tag: This luggage tag uses augmented reality technology to provide you with information about your luggage. For example, it can display the flight number, destination, and any important notes or reminders. It can also use AR to show you the location of your luggage on a map, making it easier to locate it at the airport.

Smart Luggage Tag with Power Bank: This luggage tag has a built-in power bank that can charge your devices on the go. It can also act as a power bank for other devices, such as your smartphone or tablet. This tag is especially useful for long trips or for travelers who need to keep their devices charged.

Luggage Tag with Built-in Scale: This luggage tag has a built-in scale that can weigh your luggage. This can help you avoid overweight baggage fees and ensure that you don't exceed the weight limit set by the airline. It can also provide you with real-time updates on the weight of your luggage, so you can adjust your packing accordingly.

Customizable Luggage Tag: This luggage tag allows you to personalize it with your name, initials, or a custom message. It can be made from a variety of materials, such as leather, metal, or silicone. This tag is a great way to add a personal touch to your luggage and make it stand out from the crowd
